title: ‘Google Workspace search history’ setting is now coming in June with new default behavior [U]
content:
On the Google My Activity page, one of the very first controls shown is Web & App Activity. Google will soon break up that setting with a new “Workspace search history” preference.

more…

The post ‘Google Workspace search history’ setting is now coming in June with new default behavior [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
